last_episode_to_air.name: The Hitman's Wife
last_episode_to_air.overview: At age 14, Las Vegas teen Wendy Mazaros dates 26-year-old Teddy Binion, then survives sex trafficking by escaping the man who was asked to protect her, and soon after she starts working for an associate of Teddy's. By age 19, she marries her much older boss, 78-year-old Tom Hanley - only to discover he is involved with the mob and might be a hitman.

name: Who The (Bleep) Did I Marry?
overview: Pull back the curtain on bizarre double lives and see the real stories of men and women who thought they were happily married, until the day they uncovered a shocking secret about their spouse leading them to wonder who it is they really fell in love with.
tagline: Real stories of double lives and deceived wives...

episodes.name: The Defector and the Divorcee
episodes.overview: After literally swimming away from Cuba, defector Juan Pablo Roque is hailed as a hero, and works as a rescue pilot, but his new bride of one year, Ana Margarita, is about to learn a shocking truth about her man.

episodes.name: Don Juan Down Under
episodes.overview: Donna Andersen waited her whole life for her soul mate and is finally swept off her feet by Ozzie, a charming Australian entrepreneur. After a three-day romance, the two marry within six months and she is the happiest she's ever been, until her husbands' webs of lies, deceit, and unfaithfulness surface.

episodes.name: Mr. Good Times
episodes.overview: Mary Jo enjoys a wild marriage at the heart of the disco scene until Joey's coke addiction spins out of control. Then, on May 18, 1992, a girl comes to the house and shoots her in the head - why?

episodes.name: Keeping Up Appearances
episodes.overview: Jeanne Trantel of Long Island lives a picture perfect life with her two children and commodities broker husband, Stephen, until the stress of work gets him down, but how are his erratic moods connected to a spate of robberies?

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Michelle believes her high flying husband, Marcus, has the Midas touch, until he is accused of fraud. Then he crashes his plane and disappears. Has he faked his own death?

episodes.name: The Man With Two Names
episodes.overview: When Kathy's husband confesses that he was a hit-man for the CIA and is now on the run, she accepts his story, until his lies unravel. Who is Steve, and who has he killed?

episodes.name: An Explosive Love
episodes.overview: A Mormon named Dorie Olds of Salt Lake City thought she found a perfect mate in Mark Hofmann. Mark is a celebrity in his Mormon town after identifying some rare religious papers, but his family's good fortune is rocked when letter bombs strike at the heart of the Church.

episodes.name: Caught in the Crosshairs
episodes.overview: 23-year-old Mildred Muhammad fell in love and soon married John Williams, a handsome and confident man. But events of the Gulf War turned him cold and abusive. As the DC sniper terrorizes the city, Mildred keeps her three children inside, away from the shooter and hidden from her mad ex-husband, but her nightmare is only beginning.

episodes.name: Married to a Monster
episodes.overview: Judith Mawson escaped a 19-year marriage filled with abuse, drugs, and cheating when she met Gary Ridgway, a "normal" guy in her eyes. The two had big plans as a couple in the future and she believed her future was looking bright but those plans changed.

episodes.name: Discovering Danger and a Double Life
episodes.overview: When Linda Bergstrom first met James, he was polite and chivalrous and kind. But soon after, James began to show a violent side of himself and is charged with being a peeping Tom. She begins to suspect he could be behind multiple rapes. Can she overcome her fear and find out the truth?

episodes.name: The Corpse's Bride
episodes.overview: Barbra Reifel was newly married to the handsome, dashing Michael Mastromarino, a young surgeon. But success caught up with him and he eventually spiraled out of control. She stands by him when scandal strikes but then there's more.

episodes.name: Not the Only One
episodes.overview: On leave from Iraq in 2005, Army Specialist Joe Wood is blown away by the successful and vivacious Shauna. They were married soon after, then all his money goes missing. What is she hiding?

episodes.name: Third Time's No Charm
episodes.overview: After Tammi meets handsome doctor Eric Perteet at a nightclub, she is stricken by the tragic death of his children. They fall in love and quickly marry. Eric is hired at a local hospital, but who is Dr Perteet and what is he really doing at the hospital?

episodes.name: From Protector to Predator
episodes.overview: Rickielee wanted the perfect family and after marrying policeman Jeff Pelo and having three children, she felt like her dreams had come true. Their small community of Bloomington is being stalked by a serial rapist, but how is Jeff, a hardworking police officer and happily married father of three, involved in the case?

episodes.name: The Admiral's Wife
episodes.overview: Barbara Bentley was living near San Francisco when she met and married medal-winning Rear Admiral John Perry. Barbara is living the high life with her husband, but as the cash drains from their accounts so does her trust. Is something amiss with the marriage?

episodes.name: Gunning for Love
episodes.overview: Margo Bennett was a FBI agent in Atlanta when she met and married Gene Bennett, an undercover agent. 10 years after they marry and have kids, Gene is involved in fraud and Margo is involved with another woman. How will this bitter break-up play out?

episodes.name: The Third Mrs. Smith
episodes.overview: Diane Beasley thought she had found love with John Smith. After a short courtship, they tied the knot. All was well, until the FBI showed up. When FBI agents inform newlywed Diane that her husband's previous wives died in suspicious circumstances, she knows she has more than John's dodgy credit score to worry about.

episodes.name: 'Til Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Small town sweethearts Carolyn Cox and her husband Billy seemed like a perfect couple. They built a booming business and had a lovely family during their 43 years together. How did their perfect marriage end in attempted murder?

episodes.name: Jets, Bets, & Debts
episodes.overview: Michelle Broome thought she was living the dream life when she married her longtime crush Tom. They enjoyed a jetset lifestyle of partying and flying off on exotic vacations. However, Michelle's dream life faded when her husband's gambling addictions caught up with him.

episodes.name: Cruising Towards Disaster
episodes.overview: After her husband of 20 years left her, Cynthia Castile decided it was time for some changes. When she met Wayne Chinn, a cruise ship chef, she felt all her dreams had come true. They soon married, but shortly after, his hidden past started to surface and Cynthia was knee deep in his lies.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: Activist Dina Matos and politician Jim McGreevey married and had a baby. They became the Governor and First Lady of New Jersey.and had a model life. How did a devastating secret cut short their success?

episodes.name: The Rock Star Husband
episodes.overview: Gayle Cuvreau, a single mother of two, thought she'd met and married the perfect man, until her perfect world crumbled. She is confused by the erratic behavior of her rock 'n' roll guitarist husband - is he a drug addict, or has he met someone else? Her efforts to find out take a dark turn.

episodes.name: Just Beneath the Surface
episodes.overview: Joy DeSomber and her new husband Joseph Cua are living the good life. But it all comes to a halt when Joseph tells Joy that his dear friends, the Wagners, have been brutally murdered. Joy soons unravels the ugly truth about the man she let into her life.

episodes.name: An Exercise in Murder
episodes.overview: Paul Reidel and his best friend Alex Algeri opened a 24-hour fitness center. But late one night, Alex was gunned down in the gym parking lot, and Paul realized the bullets were meant for him, in what becomes a twisted tale of murder for hire.

episodes.name: Duty, Honor, Lies
episodes.overview: When Cory Wynne met Bobbi Ann Finley, she was exactly what he wanted. But months later, with his bank account drained and his career on the line, Cory uncovers Bobbi's dark past.

episodes.name: No Bigger Gamble
episodes.overview: When Susan Walters married Mike Kuhnhausen, she considered her risk on love a worthy gamble. They are happily married until, 18 years later, a drastic change in his personality prompts Susan to file for divorce. How far will Michael go for revenge?

episodes.name: The Perfect Cover
episodes.overview: Pat Wiklund fell for Dean Mitchell, an established child psychologist who was committed to helping troubled teen boys. Pat admired her husband's work, until one day when Dean would call Pat from jail.

episodes.name: Addicted to Love
episodes.overview: John Pomroy fell in love with Tina despite her former drug addiction. But 10 years and 2 kids into the marriage, Tina's demons came back to haunt them. An ugly divorce and custody battle soon turned into something much worse.

episodes.name: Gold-Digging Grandma
episodes.overview: Elden Bowen was looking to spend his golden years with a good woman and sweet, petite Shirley Cassara seemed to fit the bill. However, after two years of marriage, he discovers she wanted much more than his heart and comes face to face with the real women he married.

episodes.name: The Weapon Inside Me
episodes.overview: After 2 marriages, taekwondo black belt Diane Reeve guardedly entered the world of dating. When she met tall, dark & handsome Philippe Padieu, Diane was swept off her feet. But after four years of illicit affairs, Philippe's deadly deception leaves Diane sparring for her life.

episodes.name: Scarred By Love
episodes.overview: When Kendra Beebe's boyfriend, actor Shelley Malil, became too controlling, she pulled away from him and ended their relationship. Her decision would leave her in the fight of her life.

episodes.name: Deadly Match
episodes.overview: When Yvette Cade was gallantly pursued by Roger Hargrave, it was only a matter of time before she gave him her heart. But when Roger's dark demons spewed a wrath of destruction, Yvette discovered an evil inside him that would set her world on fire!

episodes.name: From Lebanon With Love
episodes.overview: When Nabela Henry filed for divorce from her husband Saad Abdo, she had no idea of the pain he'd cause her. Bitter, he fled to Lebanon with their 2 children. After 3 years, Nabela will do anything to get them back, even if it meant a dangerous mission abroad.

episodes.name: Gamble On Love
episodes.overview: Adrian was always for adventure, and professional gambler Ernie seemed like her perfect match. Their relationship became a globetrotting adventure until Ernie's parents were murdered and Adrian realized something sinister was behind Ernie's poker face.

episodes.name: A Certified Horror
episodes.overview: When Angela began to date fellow nursing assistant Halinton Williams, she felt like the queen of the world. They were happily married; however, life came crashing down when a huge scandal rocks her world and she realizes she has never known her husband at all.

episodes.name: From Starry-Eyed to Star Witness
episodes.overview: When Amber Frey met Scott Peterson, she thought she found her soul mate, but she would end up a star witness in one of the nation's most highly publicized and horrific criminal cases.

episodes.name: Love Sick
episodes.overview: When Donna Kholer met handsome and charming Jim Boley in college, their chemistry was instantaneous. But twenty years and two kids later, Donna discovered that Jim was hiding a toxic secret, one that would shock a community and push Donna to the brink.

episodes.name: One Night Affair
episodes.overview: As a single mother, Robin Faulk was drawn to dependable outdoorsman Jerry Wilson. But after years of marriage, Robin's life with Jerry would implode when a horrifying crime rocked their small town... and Robin was forced to confront her husband's dark side.

episodes.name: Hearts Afire
episodes.overview: Audrey Mabrey wasn't looking for love when she stumbled into an online chat room. But when she started chatting with Christopher Hanney, a police detective, love is what she found. But after 6 years and 2 children, all of that would suddenly change.

episodes.name: My Life My Nightmare
episodes.overview: When Robin Garriott met Kevin Cobb, she had found true love. After almost two decades of their relationship and starting a loving family together, Robin never thought she would eventually help to convict him of sexually molesting their only daughter.

episodes.name: Houston, We Have a Marital Problem
episodes.overview: When Kaydee Wilson married Thad Roberts, a go-getter who dreamed of becoming a NASA astronaut she thought the stars had aligned. But their relationship crashed and burned when Kaydee's husband committed one of the most outoutrageous crimes in NASA history

episodes.name: Stranger in My House
episodes.overview: Andie Nash was swept off her feet when she began dating handsome Simon Reid. Their relationship progressed quickly... until Simon vanished, leaving Andie devastated. But it wasn't long before Andie learned she had been one of many victims of Simon's lies!

episodes.name: Predatory Patriarch
episodes.overview: Shaina Gibson imagined an everlasting union when she eloped with loyal military man and childhood friend, Joseph Allsop. But after the untimely death of their baby girl, Shaina discovered that Joe was camouflaging horrifying secrets instead.

episodes.name: You Get What You Pay For
episodes.overview: When Kansas City native George Cascone fell hard for his teenage sweetheart, Dorothy Luther, he wasted no time proposing. But soon, George would see a dark side to his wife, revealing a diabolical woman willing to stop at nothing to get what she wants!

episodes.name: The Unexpected Life
episodes.overview: Andrea Merriman was living the American Dream: four beautiful children, a gorgeous home and a husband who had a knack for making money. But after 20 years of marriage, Andrea would see that behind her husband's business sense...was an explosive secret!

episodes.name: Forgive and Forget
episodes.overview: While college student Crystal Pretzer was home from school, she suddenly found herself in love with her handsome co-worker, Shawn Harris. But after a beautiful storybook wedding, Crystal soon finds herself fighting for her life--against her own husband!

episodes.name: Field of Schemes
episodes.overview: Jennifer Ranallo thought she'd hit a home run when she married entrepreneur and former baseball player named Jack Ranallo. But 10 years later, Jennifer would see that her husband was playing a very different kind of game, and she didnt know the rules.

episodes.name: Fight for Life
episodes.overview: When Christy Martin married her hotshot trainer Jim, everyone knew she was destined for professional boxing greatness. But when don't work out and she wants to call it quits, a chilling encounter would force her to go toe-to-toe with deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Homeland Insecurity
episodes.overview: Divorcee Katherine Blankenship never expected to find love in her former classmate, war vet Glenn Seymour. Glenn seemed like the ultimate protector. But before long, secrets rushed to the surface leaving Katherine baffled about who her hero really was!

episodes.name: Ether Man
episodes.overview: Joylynn Martinez was looking for anything but love, until she met the charismatic Robert "Howard" Bruce. But once they tie the knot, she would find herself swept up in a 20 year old cold case--one that would reveal her husband's twisted double life!

episodes.name: Darkness, Deception, DNA
episodes.overview: Lisa Bradford had two beautiful children and a charming, doting husband, Dennis. She thought she had a 'happily ever after' ahead of her. However, when Dennis was arrested for a heinous crime all of that changed. And the nightmare wasn't even over…

episodes.name: Prayer and Prophet
episodes.overview: Amber Dawn Lee thought she'd found paradise when her family moved to Utah. But under the surface of faith, Amber's found an underworld of filth. The prophet might have been the voice of God but Amber would soon realize she was in the arms of the devil.

episodes.name: Torrence the Tyrant
episodes.overview: Single mom Lisa Torrence surprised herself with a sudden relationship with handsome neighbor Cecil, but the real shock was still to come. Ten years into her marriage, the Cecil she knew vanished, and in his place was something dark and dangerous.

episodes.name: Perfect Stranger
episodes.overview: Ryan Burns was quickly climbing the career ladder, all he needed for a perfect life was the perfect wife. He thought he had found her in Jodi, a beautiful, driven woman he met at a conference. But when Jodie came to visit, danger had come to town.

episodes.name: Murder To the Letter
episodes.overview: Teenager David Hummert loved his mother more than words could say. When threatening letters began arriving, David feared for her safety. Those threats became reality when a killer appeared... and he was forced to question everything he knew about his family.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Piedmont Street
episodes.overview: When Brent Doonan hired Mark Barton, he thought he'd found the perfect man for the job. Mark was talented with investing. But when Mark's successes became reckless losses...he exploded in a fury that would leave everyone, including Brent, in danger.

episodes.name: Deployment and a Double Life
episodes.overview: While Rachel Harner, a U.S. Marine, awaiting deployment, she worked to earn cash. She fell in love with the manager, Michael Parson, who proposed. Rachel felt nothing could stand in their way…. until a gun, a wife and a life of lies destroyed everything.

episodes.name: Blinded by Love
episodes.overview: Jamie Hart had done his share of dating until he met teaching assistant Melissa Stredney. When Melissa announced she was pregnant, a happy Jamie proposed. Then Melissa suddenly became a vortex of terror. By the time Jamie noticed... there was no escape.

episodes.name: He's No Angel
episodes.overview: Holley (Patterson) Angel was focused on raising her two girls. But even Holley could not ignore the sparks flying between her and a co-worker named Brian. 10 years later, a confession will reveal a betrayal that drags Holley and her family through a living hell.

episodes.name: The Devil Inside
episodes.overview: Single mom Anna Torres found the love of her life when she met Ed Montano. The couple wed, and Ed was a father figure to Anna's daughter Lizzie. A decade later, Anna found that Ed's kind ways were a mask—under which he was hiding horrible secrets.

episodes.name: Love Intrusion
episodes.overview: When Rhonda Heaton met "Gentle Giant" Bob Cash in Steamboat Springs, CO, she was confident that he was her 'happily ever after'. But Bob's deeply buried demons began to surface and, before long, Rhonda's romance became a bone-chilling nightmare.

episodes.name: You've Got Jail
episodes.overview: Kathleen Stimon had a picture perfect life with her son and her husband, Bruce. But in 2011, Bruce seemed to only love one thing – his smartphone. And soon, Bruce would use the cyber-world to destroy lives and show Kathleen what a snake he truly was.

episodes.name: The Face of Death
episodes.overview: In 1988, Deborah Hunnewell fell for her co-worker, Scott Erskine. In a few months, they were tying the knot and expecting. Then Scott started acting strange. Before Deborah knew it, she was face to face with the devil--and it would haunt her forever!

episodes.name: Lisa Outlaw
episodes.overview: In 1989, Rob and Lisa Whedbee had it all, a beautiful home, a loving son and a baby girl on the way. It seemed like nothing could prevent this family from climbing the social ladder. Until lust, greed and a love triangle destroyed everything...

episodes.name: Marvelous Deception
episodes.overview: In 1993, psychotherapist Danielle Jenson moved to Palm Beach, Florida, and her demanding schedule didn't leave time for a social life. When Danielle met Tom Abrams, her world became much bigger...and richer! But Tom was hiding a greedy secret.

episodes.name: Weathering the Storm
episodes.overview: Newly single Amy Anderton was caught off-guard when she fell for an Irishman and school teacher but this upstanding do-gooder was hiding a deviant darkness. When Amy unearthed his secret, she's forced to make the most difficult decision of her life.

episodes.name: Heart Attack
episodes.overview: Louise Gallagher was focused on her daughters and her career. When she meets charming entrepreneur Conrad Cini, Louise was instantly attracted to his mysterious qualities. That is, until Conrad's dark past came back to haunt Louise's terrifying present!

episodes.name: Possum and the Snake
episodes.overview: After a failed marriage, Christie Smith was ready to spice up her love life and after running into her high school crush, Christie's life became anything but boring. He was her Prince Charming until he started finding pleasure in her pain.

episodes.name: Justice Served
episodes.overview: Valerie Justice was shocked when her boyfriend, Laurence Lovejoy, proposed! Her teenage daughter, Erin, had doubts but supported them, until one day Erin accused Laurence of rape. Valerie's world was shattered. Little did she know the worst was still to come.

episodes.name: Family Man
episodes.overview: Krystal Kunkel thought romance was a thing of the past, until she met Tommy Garcia. He stepped seamlessly into the role of husband and father. But after 6 years of marriage, Krystal would learn her perfect family man might just be a devil in disguise.

episodes.name: Home Fire Burning
episodes.overview: Beth Miller always played by the rules, but after meeting handsome Adam Carriere Beth couldn't suppress her desire to rebel against her upbringing. Little did she know that Adam's dark obsession would ignite an inferno, leaving Beth to sweep up the ashes.

episodes.name: Insufficient Funds
episodes.overview: Katherine Cole was raising her 2-year-old daughter and was on the dating scene, but no one stood out until she met Anthony Greco. Her fairytale turned into a nightmare when Anthony goes to desperate and violent measures to win back his most prized asset.

episodes.name: World Wide Web of Lies
episodes.overview: Sabrina Sanders was thrilled to marry a man of the law. But her excitement soon waned when her husband became distant; holed up in his computer room at all hours of the night. Sabrina was not prepared for the sinister secret hiding under his badge.

episodes.name: Four's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Charmaine Whalen wanted a big beautiful wedding with the love of her life. So when she met a handsome stranger who promised her just that, she thought her dreams were coming true. But Charmaine would soon find herself in the center of her worst nightmare.

episodes.name: Witt's End
episodes.overview: Jason Witt had everything, except love. That is, until he meets beautiful Andria Stanley online. But his perfect match is hiding a dark secret behind her gorgeous smile. And when he discovers Andria's true nature, Jason comes face to face with pure evil.

episodes.name: Badge of Dishonor
episodes.overview: Rachel Alvarez thought her husband Sergio had found his calling when he embarked on a career as a cop. One day police arrived at her door with a warrant and some news about what Sergio had really been up to all those nights on the job.

episodes.name: Dangerous Game
episodes.overview: Seventeen-year-old Mandy Boardman is courted by a man twice her age, David Wise, who played on her softball team. It seemed she had met her perfect match. After the pair wed, it wasn't long before Mandy realized David was playing a vile game of his own.

episodes.name: The Sympathy Card
episodes.overview: For Tabitha Howe, romance was the last thing on her mind when she fell for Scott Wellington. But behind his kind-hearted façade was a monster. And Tabitha would soon question everything she knew about her first true love.

episodes.name: Malicious Woundings
episodes.overview: Joyce Sowa gave up her independence when she fell for a real estate agent named Bryant Parker. The couple soon wed - but it wasn't long before Bryant's charm wore off. His anger escalated, and soon their troubles left Joyce with a bleeding heart.

episodes.name: Campus Creep
episodes.overview: Fifteen-year-old Kari Rogers lived her life in the fast lane. So in 1991 when her friends introduced her to 18-year-old, Lonnie Keith, the two moved quickly and got married. But Kari quickly found out that Lonnie had many dirty little secrets.

episodes.name: Dangerous Consequences
episodes.overview: Love was the last thing on Rachel McFarland's mind, until she fell for shy, single dad, Darrell Wilson. Their marriage didn't last long and when Rachel moved on, she and her new beau would discover just how deadly Darrell's wrath could be.

episodes.name: A Deadly Secret
episodes.overview: Shawna Williams thought that by marrying one of her oldest friends, she was guaranteed a long and fulfilling partnership. She had no way of knowing that her husband Shawn had been harboring a threatening secret since their very first date.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Affair
episodes.overview: Marine Sergeant Stephen Tepatti fell hard for Astrid Peñate. Within a year they were married and raising a son. When Astrid's friend Ebony arrived to keep her company, Stephen thought nothing of it – until his life mysteriously began to unravel.

episodes.name: Poison Love
episodes.overview: When 28-year-old army vet Nathan Richardson settles into civilian life, he falls for actress Shannon Rogers. Not long after they took their vows, Nathan discovered the devil behind Shannon's smile and would soon find himself a matter of national security.

episodes.name: Evil Beauty
episodes.overview: When Matt Woods looked at Meri McCracken, he saw a beautiful woman, even though there had been rumors about Meri for years that earned her the nickname Crazy Meri. Matt chose to ignore it, but within months, his marriage was a living hell.

episodes.name: Duty, Honor, Deception
episodes.overview: When a colonel's wife discovers her husband's startling double life, she must choose between her own future and the good of the US Military; she overcomes betrayal to launch a one woman campaign to protect other military spouses.

episodes.name: What Happened Off Camera
episodes.overview: TV news anchorwoman Marisa Burke and her seemingly perfect husband Mark Kandel become the eye of a media storm when Mark's twisted double life starts making headlines.

episodes.name: Bad and Blue
episodes.overview: When Isaiah Carvalho meets NYPD Officer Valerie Cincinelli, he thinks his dreams have come true; he soon learns she's deceptive and dangerous.

episodes.name: Unholy Matrimony
episodes.overview: Carol Dennis' decades of hell started when a polygamous Mormon cult leader selected her, at the age of 16, as his next wife. Becoming a “church wife” is just the beginning of Carol's nightmare.

episodes.name: Love and Death in Vail
episodes.overview: A romance blooms between Shawnie and Ron over their shared love of athletics. But after their marriage, Shawnie discovers an unseen side of Ron as his unstable behavior goes from manipulative to nefarious, forcing her to confront his secret life.

episodes.name: The Knockout
episodes.overview: Ramon Sosa, a former boxer, marries Lulu, a beautiful brunette, and finds himself in the fight of his life; Ramon is forced into drastic action when he receives a warning that his wife is hiring a hit man.

episodes.name: The Id and the Ego
episodes.overview: When a beautiful student meets an esteemed psychologist, she believes she found her soulmate; when he suddenly disappears, she discovers he lived a bizarre double life in Detroit's most notorious neighborhood.

episodes.name: Mark the Mark
episodes.overview: A single father finally finds a love with whom he can grow old; however, just months after they've wed, she depletes his retirement savings, and he learns he's only the latest in a string of victims; when he files for divorce, things get much worse.

episodes.name: Smoke and Mirrors
episodes.overview: Debra Proctor, a nurse and a pillar of her Cherokee community, meets a caring stranger online and falls in love; they have a happy marriage until the disturbing truth about him causes her world to come crashing down.

episodes.name: The Killer Beside Me
episodes.overview: Single mom, Wilda Gadd, finds a family-oriented single dad who seems like the perfect life partner, until he devolves into a dangerous monster; she's the only one who can bring him to justice.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A teen marries an older man, but their age difference is the least of her problems. One day, she makes a discovery so grotesque, it poisons their union forever. Then a Marine falls for a beautiful woman but her conniving friend wants to kill the marriage.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A mom of four finds a letter that exposes her partner as a monster incapable of telling the truth; a woman falls for a former prom-king-turned-cop and thinks she finally has it all, but after a knock on her door, she realizes she's lost everything.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A high-powered career woman plans a dream wedding to a dashing realtor who promptly morphs into a nightmarish husband. Then, a man believes the fiery relationship with his ailing wife couldn't possibly get worse -- until the day the FBI arrests him.

episodes.name: A Hate, Hate Relationship
episodes.overview: A California woman catches her husband cheating, but the more she forgives, the more outrageous his lies become; inside a mild-mannered husband lies an unhinged stalker who tries to ensure his wife is never happy again.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A woman shares a first and last name with her soldier husband, but that's where the similarities end -- and their differences could get her killed. A man marries the prettiest girl in town only to find that beauty is fleeting, but evil is forever.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A man terrorizes his ex-girlfriend, and when his wife finds out, he sets his sights on her; a single mom falls for an injured man she allows to recuperate in her home; when his sweet façade starts to sour, the results are earth-shattering.

episodes.name: Devious Dealmakers
episodes.overview: A married woman's life of privilege abruptly ends when she gets involved with a man and asks him for a deadly favour; A woman moves to Florida and falls for an entrepreneur -- but he's hiding a secret that could land him in prison for decades.

episodes.name: Liar, Liar
episodes.overview: A woman's new love seems to be the real deal, but her gut says otherwise; she views something so vile she must risk her life to make things right; a single mum agrees to marry her ideal man, but she soon finds he's someone she never knew at all.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A girl worries about her mother when the woman decides to get married -- but the teen should be worried about herself; a woman meets her soulmate, but years into the marriage, she discovers he's her nemesis.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Despite her best friend's disapproval, a divorcée gets involved with an ex-con; after an act of unthinkable violence, she realizes her friend was right all along; a woman learns her new husband uses his computer for much more than work.

episodes.name: A Controlled Burn
episodes.overview: Sparks fly when a young woman meets a handsome aspiring firefighter. However, after marrying, those sparks erupt into an inferno of violence and obsession. Next, a mum shares custody with her soon-to-be ex, but his new job threatens the whole family.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: A woman develops severe stomach problems, and even though it appears it is something she ate, it's probably her choice of mate; a wife hears rumors about her husband cheating, but when she discovers what he's really up to, an affair is preferable.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: A woman living a dream life with an older husband watches her world go up in flames when he reveals his true self; a single mom marries a soldier and has an adorable baby, but tragedy strikes, and it will take years before the horrid truth emerges.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: A self-described nerd meets a brilliant man who goes on to work at NASA; it isn't until the relationship takes off that she sees her aspiring astronaut is just an earthly criminal; a woman's hunky Brit vanishes, but she'll soon hope he stays gone.

episodes.name: Dreamers and Schemers
episodes.overview: After the birth of his child, a man discovers that the stunning woman he married is hellbent on his destruction. Next, a wife revels in her picture-perfect life until her husband gives her some news that will shatter everything she thought was real.

episodes.name: 'Til Prison Do Us Part
episodes.overview: A Rhode Island woman's formerly sweet husband suddenly turns against her in the worst way possible, and a trusting wife finds a terrible surprise when she opens her husband's mail.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: A female boxer finds leaving her husband is her life's biggest fight. Next, a divorcee finds love again at a high school reunion, but the person she knew as a kid is far from the man he now claims to be.

episodes.name: Never Let You Go
episodes.overview: Law enforcement student Amanda Sigers falls in love and eventually marries med student Sayantan 'Sy' Ghose. When Amanda gets custody of her sister's baby, she discovers that Sy has a dark and dangerous side, and divorces him. As she moves on and starts dating someone new, Sy can't seem to leave her alone. (also shown as S7:E28)

episodes.name: Horror by Proxy
episodes.overview: Sean Scott marries his high school sweetheart, Wendi Ellis, but things soon turn sour as Wendi racks up bizarre and destructive offenses; in the final conflict, Sean must choose between his family's survival and his sworn vow.

episodes.name: The Bride Who Will Never Be
episodes.overview: When Melanie marries James Addie, she believes she's found the perfect husband, unaware he will lead a double life one day; as the days count down to his second wedding, James' secret is in danger of being exposed, and soon someone will die.

episodes.name: Dr. Date Rape
episodes.overview: Law student Jessika Rovell becomes engaged to a Philadelphia doctor who claims to be a Naval intelligence agent; when his secret life finally comes to light, she discovers he is one of the worst sexual predators in Pennsylvania history.

episodes.name: The Child Bride
episodes.overview: Rising rock and roll star Jerry Lee Lewis dazzles thirteen-year-old Myra Brown when he comes to live at her Memphis, Tenn., home to record at Sun Records; her life becomes headline news when he manipulates her into marrying him.

episodes.name: The Halloween Bride
episodes.overview: Montie meets Shaynna on Halloween, but she turns out to be a horror show.

episodes.name: The Babysitter Killer
episodes.overview: Recently divorced Brian Cargill thinks he's met the woman of his dreams; however, Kimberly Cargill is a master manipulator, and her abusive and violent nature tragically leads to murder.

episodes.name: The Hangman
episodes.overview: Special Ed schoolteacher and devout Catholic Tracey Wygant is sticking out her abusive marriage to Chris Chanowitz through thick and thin until his surprise gift almost ends her life.

episodes.name: Casanova Con Man
episodes.overview: A con man lures a single mom away from her family and into mayhem.

episodes.name: The Hitman's Wife
episodes.overview: At age 14, Las Vegas teen Wendy Mazaros dates 26-year-old Teddy Binion, then survives sex trafficking by escaping the man who was asked to protect her, and soon after she starts working for an associate of Teddy's. By age 19, she marries her much older boss, 78-year-old Tom Hanley - only to discover he is involved with the mob and might be a hitman.
